ssot__VoucherDefinition__dlm.name: Voucher Definition
ssot__VoucherDefinition__dlm.description: The Voucher Definition DMO represents the details about a voucher associated with a loyalty program.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date when the record was created.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID to logical name of object where record originated, for example a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__DiscountPercent__c.description: The reduction in price that a voucher holder is entitled to, typically shown as a fraction of original price.

ssot__EffectiveDate__c.description: The date when voucher goes into effect.

ssot__ExpirationPeriodnumber__c.description: The quantity of time units defined by Expiration Period UOM.

ssot__ExpirationPeriodUOM__c.description: A reference ID to unit of time used to define expiration period of voucher, for example days, weeks, or months.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID to an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__FaceValueAmount__c.description: The value amount of a voucher.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__IsActive__c.description: An indicator if the voucher is active.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__LoyaltyProgramId__c.description: A reference ID to marketing strategy designed to encourage customers to continue shopping at or use services of a business associated with the program.

ssot__PartnerAccountId__c.description: A reference ID to account of organization that partners in offering voucher.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as primary key for the Voucher Definition DMO.

ssot__VoucherExpirationTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to the expiration type.

ssot__VoucherStatusId__c.description: A reference ID to status of voucher, for example, issued, expired, or redeemed.

ssot__VoucherTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to type of voucher, for example accrual or redemption.
